description: Adds a rating to an item to which you have access (POST only). Only one rating can be given to an item per user. If this call is made on a currently rated item, the new rating will overwrite the existing rating. A user cannot rate their own item. Available only to authenticated users. http://resources.arcgis.com/en/help/arcgis-rest-api/#/Add_Rating/02r30000007v000000/
title: addRating

success.description: Indicates if the operation was successful
